tasks.label: clearOldMainIfOldAndMake
tasks.command: if [ -f "main.cpp" ]; then if [ ! -d "$PWD/.workingDir" ]; then mkdir "$PWD/.workingDir"; fi; if [ ! -f "$PWD/.workingDir/main.cpp.sha1" ]; then sha1sum main.cpp > "$PWD/.workingDir/main.cpp.sha1"; make; else if [ "$(cat "$PWD/.workingDir/main.cpp.sha1")" != "$(sha1sum main.cpp)" ]; then if [ -f "main" ]; then rm main; fi; if [ -f "main.o" ]; then rm main.o; fi; sha1sum main.cpp > "$PWD/.workingDir/main.cpp.sha1"; make; fi; fi; fi;
